file-types: Accepts jpg, png, pdf and json
file-not-accepted: This file is not accepted. Please try it again with a different file type.
decrypt-modal-title: Oh! Seems this file is encrypted!
decrypt-modal-body: Please, introduce your password to decrypt the file and validate it. Note that if you exit the modal the validating process will be interrupted.
ui-password-error: This password seems to be incorrect
